DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate potential effect Ritonavir ( Norvir® ) omeprazole ( Prilosec® ) pharmacokinetics samatasvir assess safety tolerability study drug administer alone combination healthy participant .
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Effect Ritonavir Omeprazole Pharmacokinetics Samatasvir ( IDX719 ) Healthy Participants ( MK-1894-006 )
DOC.criteria: Read sign write informed consent form ( ICF ) nature study fully explain . All participant childbearing potential must agree use double method birth control ( one must barrier ) Screening least 90 day last dose study drug . Pregnant breastfeeding .
